channel.title: Standing on the shoulders of giants (postgresql)

item.title: Copy records from csv in postgresql
item.dc:creator: Matthieu Choplin
item.description:
System Message: ERROR/3 (<string>, line 1)

Unknown directive type "block".

.. block:: sql

  CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE original_table_name_temp(like original_table_name including all);
  COPY original_table_name_temp FROM 'path_of_your_csv';

Source: http://postgresql.1045698.n5.nabble.com/reverse-strpos-td1891709.html
